quotes.quote: I am convinced that attitude is the key to success or failure in almost any of life's endeavors. Your attitude-your perspective, your outlook, how you feel about yourself, how you feel about other people-determines you priorities, your actions, your values. Your attitude determines how you interact with other people and how you interact with yourself.
Your living is determined not so much by what life brings to you as by the attitude you bring to life; not so much by what happens to you as by the way your mind looks at what happens.
If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
The greatest day in your life and mine is when we take total responsibility for our attitudes. That's the day we truly grow up.
How we think shows through in how we act. Attitudes are mirrors of the mind. They reflect thinking.
It is your attitude, not your aptitude, that determines your altitude.
A bad attitude can literally block love, blessings, and destiny from finding you. Don't be the reason you don't succeed.
Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.

Your attitude is like a box of crayons that color your world. Constantly color your picture gray, and your picture will always be bleak. Try adding some bright colors to the picture by including humor, and your picture begins to lighten up.
A 'positive attitude' is definitely one of the keys to success. My definition of a positive attitude is a simple one: Looking for the good in all circumstances.
A bad attitude is like a flat tire. If you don't change it, you'll never go anywhere.

Our attitude towards what has happened to us in life is the important thing to recognize. Once hopeless, my life is now hope-full, but it did not happen overnight. The last of human freedoms, to choose one's attitude in any given set of circumstances, is to choose one's own way.
Your attitude is either the lock on, or the key to the door of success.
Our attitude in the face of life's challenges determines our suffering or our freedom.

Positive attitude enables you to go with passion and see possibility in every challenging circumstance. It was by that, that great achievers picked up metal scraps on the floor and saw machines built from it.
Our attitudes control our lives. Attitudes are a secret power working twenty-four hours a day, for good or bad. It is of paramount importance that we know how to harness and control this great force.
A positive attitude turns 'I can't & I won't,' into 'I have & I WILL!'

Could we change our attitude, we should not only see life differently, but life itself would come to be different. Life would undergo a change of appearance because we ourselves had undergone a change of attitude.
If you have a positive attitude and constantly strive to give your best effort, eventually you will overcome your immediate problems and find you are ready for greater challenges.
A positive attitude accelerates your development as a creative person. Believe in yourself.
Your attitude can take you forward or your attitude can take you down. The choice is always yours!
The winner's edge is not in a gifted birth, a high IQ, or in talent. The winner's edge is all in the attitude, not aptitude. Attitude is the criterion for success.
Attitudes are nothing more than habits of thoughts, and habits can be acquired. An action repeated becomes an attitude realized.
Whenever you're in conflict with someone, there is one factor that can make the difference between damaging your relationship and deepening it. That factor is attitude.
A strong positive mental attitude will create more miracles than any wonder drug.
You cannot control what happens to you, but you can control your attitude toward what happens to you, and in that, you will be mastering change rather than allowing it to master you.
Our attitude toward life determines life's attitude towards us.
There is little difference in people, but that little difference makes a big difference. The little difference is attitude. The big difference is whether it is positive or negative.
A bad attitude is merely a reflection of how you feel about yourself.
People's rise or fall, success or failure, happiness or unhappiness depends upon their attitude... a person's attitude will create the situation he or she imagines.
Having a positive mental attitude is asking how something can be done rather than saying it can't be done.
Attitude is a choice. What you think you can do, whether positive or negative, confident or scared, will most likely happen.
If your attitude toward the world is good, you will obtain good results. If your attitude is excellent, excellent will your results.
The most important thing you'll ever wear is your attitude.
We choose what attitudes we have right now. And it's a continuing choice.
You can't always change your situation, but you can always change your attitude.
A healthy attitude is contagious but don't wait to catch it from others. Be a carrier.
Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
The only disability in life is a bad attitude.
Attitude will always define who we are in life.
Your attitude is everything, and it determines how you experience every aspect of your life.
Control your attitude or it will control you.
I believe your attitude is the most important choice you can make.
Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character.
People may hear your words, but they feel your attitude.
Attitudes are nothing more than habits of thought.
Our attitude towards others determines their attitude towards us.
Great effort springs naturally from great attitude.
Excellence is not a skill. It is an attitude.
The meaning of things lies not in the things themselves, but in our attitude towards them.
Of all the attitudes we can acquire, surely the attitude of gratitude is the most important and by far the most life changing.
If you can't change your fate, change your attitude.
Work is either fun or drudgery. It depends on your attitude. I like fun.
We cannot choose the things that will happen to us. But we can choose the attitude we will take toward anything that happens. Success or failure depends on your attitude.
Take charge of your attitude. Don't let someone else choose it for you.
Attitudes are more important than facts.
For success, attitude is equally as important as ability.
The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change his future by merely changing his attitude.
There are no menial jobs, only menial attitudes.

Develop an attitude of gratitude, and give thanks for everything that happens to you, knowing that every step forward is a step toward achieving something bigger and better than your current situation.
Attitude is your acceptance of the natural laws, or your rejection of the natural laws.
The greatest revolution of our generation is the discovery that human beings, by changing the inner attitudes of their minds, can change the outer aspects of their lives.
Any fact facing us is not as important as our attitude toward it, for that determines our success or failure.
A happy person is not a person in a certain set of circumstances, but rather a person with a certain set of attitudes.
The ideal attitude is to be physically loose and mentally tight.
The remarkable thing is, we have a choice everyday regarding the attitude we will embrace for that day.
Adopting the right attitude can convert a negative stress into a positive one.
Happiness doesn't depend on any external conditions, it is governed by our mental attitude.
Success or failure depends more upon attitude than upon capacity.
Positive anything is better than negative nothing.
Attitude is greatly shaped by influence and association.
Attitude is everything, so pick a good one.
Attitude drives actions. Actions drive results. Results drive lifestyles.
Attitude is a choice. Think positive thoughts daily. Believe in yourself.
Attitude is the reflection of a person, and our world mirrors our attitude.
The attitude is very important. Because, your behavior radiates how you feel.
A positive attitude causes a chain reaction of positive thoughts, events and outcomes. It is a catalyst and it sparks extraordinary results.
Our lives are not determined by what happens to us but how we react to what happens, not by what life brings us but the attitude we bring to life.
Keep a good attitude and do the right thing even when it's hard. When you do that you are passing the test. And God promises you your marked moments are on their way.
Improve your performance by improving your attitude.
Our attitude can give us an uncommonly positive perspective.
A positive attitude means all the difference in the world.
A positive attitude from you tends to produce a positive attitude toward you.
